title: Possibly unpopular opinion on this season's ranked rewards
body:
Riot shouldn't offer a 2 month window for those who got punished to work it off and obtain rewards.

Why? Because toxicity punishments being tied to rewards has been a thing since Season 4. This isn't new for most people. Most everyone knew the end of season was coming up and knew punishments would lead to being stripped of rewards.

I'm not going to deny that honor takes time to obtain. But I honestly have to ask, how hard is it for all of you to NOT be punished? I have my moments, and I have RARELY been punished. So part of me simply doesn't understand why so many people have trouble with not being unpleasant.
